summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1993 FORD E350.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 07V336000 (VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL) AND FORD RECALL NUMBER 05S28 IN AUGUST OF 2007.  HE CALLED FORD SEVERAL TIMES AND THEY STATED THAT THE PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE IN MID'DECEMBER OF 2007 AND THEN IN JANUARY OF 2008.  THE DEACTIVATION SWITCH WAS DISCONNECTED.  THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 184,000.
